Desc.eng: Want to buy a ticket? A nice ticket? Good price! Please!
Fine, but I want to watch this apocalypse from a front row seat.
I'm not wasting my time on a Domovoy. Crying in a ticket booth. At a Circus. Really.
I've killed thousands of creatures without mercy, but that's not an excuse to lose all humanity.
Oh my, he is still wailing. Can I kill him then?
I'm so happy, I will do anything for first guest! Just ask! I'm so good with bombs!
A Domovoy with an affection for bombs. What a surprise.
Look, a Domovoy in the ticket booth! Kill him, quick!
He seems rather harmless. And I've already killed my share of Domovoys for two lifetimes.
Can you stop crying and tell me what's going on?
My first day at work! Many nice tickets to sell, but nobody coming. Everybody went crazy at Dark Carnival!
Crazy enough to hire a monster as a ticket seller?
Everyone got tortured to death by evil clowns. No one else was volunteering but me!
